allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update CLAUDE.md to reflect current codebase state

This update brings CLAUDE.md in sync with the expense-tracker-ai codebase
after significant feature additions:

Major Updates:
- Document new MonthlyInsights component with donut chart visualization
- Update Category type from fixed union to dynamic string type
- Add comprehensive Testing Infrastructure section with Jest setup
- Document dynamic category creation feature and storage functions
- Fix Export Modal line count \(420 lines, not 850+\)
- Update Data Flow diagram to include 4 tabs and categories state
- Add getCategoryColor utility documentation
- Include test commands in Essential Commands section

Component Changes:
- Added MonthlyInsights.tsx to File Locations Reference
- Updated state management documentation \(categories state\)
- Documented category storage functions \(saveCategories, loadCategories\)

Testing:
- Document Jest + React Testing Library setup
- Add jest.config.js and jest.setup.js references
- Include test commands \(npm test, npm run test:watch\)
- Note ResizeObserver mock for Recharts

Quick Reference Updates:
- Rewrote "Add new expense category" for dynamic system
- Updated to reflect runtime category customization via UI
- Noted Category type is now string, not union

Dependencies:
- Added testing devDependencies section
- Listed Jest, Testing Library packages

Documentation:
- Referenced 6 additional markdown files in expense-tracker-ai/
- Noted docs/ subdirectory structure

All tests pass and build compiles successfully.
